thread.title: 'Late Show' Animation Expertly Skewers Donald Trump’s Reversal Of Transgender Bathroom Policies
thread.title_full: 'Late Show' Animation Expertly Skewers Donald Trump’s Reversal Of Transgender Bathroom Policies

author: Lee Moran
title: 'Late Show' Animation Expertly Skewers Donald Trump’s Reversal Of Transgender Bathroom Policies
text: 'Late Show' Animation Expertly Skewers Donald Trump’s Reversal Of Transgender Bathroom Policies A perfect response to the rollback. By Lee Moran Bathroom signs come together to send a message to President Donald Trump in this genius animation. Following Trump’s reversal of transgender bathroom policies on Wednesday, the “ Late Show ” imagined just how the “brave souls that point the way to our nation’s bathrooms” are reacting to the news. Spoiler: They’re not taking it lightly. Find out how they’re responding in the clip above. Related Coverage
